item.text: <st data-num="1063" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> I <st data-num="2919">made up</st> <st data-num="1673" class="">my own</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">mind</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="2064">pay</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">another</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">painful</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">visit</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> make <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3076" class="">sad</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> would be left to <st data-num="2165" class="">make</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2165" class="">glad</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1508">but</st> the one <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3076" class="">caused to be sad</st>?

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="846">very thing</st> to you,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> when I <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st><n id="2" /> I would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">sadness</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> those <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">ought</st> to make <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st>, since I am <st data-num="3982" class="">confident</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> would <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">out of</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">distress</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4928" class="">anguish</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> I <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1144" class="">tears</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3076">make</st> you <st data-num="3076" class="">sad</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> to let you <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4056" class="">especially</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> has caused <st data-num="3076" class="">sadness</st>, he has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3076" class="">saddened</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> alone, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="575" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3313">some extent</st> (<st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="1912" class="">exaggerate)</st><n id="1" /> he has saddened <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> as well.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="2009" class="">punishment</st> on <st data-num="5108">such an individual</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4119" class="">majority</st> is <st data-num="2425" class="">enough</st> for him,

<st data-num="5620">so that</st> now <st data-num="5121" class="">instead</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> should <st data-num="3123">rather</st> <st data-num="5483" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">comfort</st> him.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5108">This</st> will keep him from being <st data-num="2666" class="">overwhelmed</st> by <st data-num="4053" class="">excessive</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">grief</st> to the point of despair.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> I <st data-num="3870" class="">urge</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="2964" class="">reaffirm</st> your <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1519" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> I <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> you:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1382">test</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1097">see</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5255" class="">obedient</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st>.

If you <st data-num="5483" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">anyone</st> for <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st>, <st data-num="2504">I also</st> forgive himâ€”<st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">indeed</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="5483" class="">forgiven</st> (<st data-num="1477">if</st> I have <st data-num="5483" class="">forgiven</st> <st data-num="5100">anything</st>) I did so <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4383" class="">presence</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,

<st data-num="2443">so that</st> we <st data-num="4122" class="">may</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="4122" class="">exploited</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> (<st data-num="1063">for</st> we are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="50" class="">ignorant</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3540" class="">schemes)</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> when I <st data-num="2064" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5174" class="">Troas</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> proclaim the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="2532">even</st> though the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> had <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> of opportunity<n id="3" /> for <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,
I had no relief in my spirit, because I did not find my brother Titus there. So I said goodbye to them and set out for Macedonia.
But thanks be to God who always leads us in triumphal procession in Christ and who makes known through us the fragrance that consists of the knowledge of him in every place.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> a <st data-num="2175">sweet aroma</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> those who <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> being <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> those who are <st data-num="622" class="">perishing</st>â€”

to the<st data-num="3739"> latter</st> an <st data-num="3744" class="">odor</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3739">former</st> a <st data-num="3744" class="">fragrance</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="5101">who</st> is <st data-num="2425" class="">adequate</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>?<n id="2" />
For we are not like so many others, hucksters who peddle the word of God for profit, but we are speaking in Christ before God as persons of sincerity, as persons sent from God.
